name: Advanced Eye Care

name: Wu Eye Care
description: Offers comprehensive eye care with a multilingual staff that speaks English, Spanish, Mandarin, Cantonese, Fuzhou, and Taiwanese. Specializes in cataract and refractive vision correction

name: New York Ophthalmology (Manhattan - Washington Heights)
description: Provides comprehensive eye care, including exams, disease management, and surgery. Their staff can assist in Chinese

description: Offers advanced eye care with a diverse range of services and specialties. Their staff can assist in Chinese

name: EyeCare by Ophthalmology

name: SightMD (Flushing)

name: Chinatown Optical Group
description: While primarily an optical group, they have doctors who can provide prescriptions and utilize diagnostic technologies for early detection of eye conditions. Their staff is noted for being helpful and polite
